description:
The Stormi mitt offers durability and resistance to wear and tear, thanks to its sturdy softshell and resilient leather palm. Equipped with a pull tab for effortless removal, a handy suede nose wipe, and a comfortable acrylic cuff, this mitt is designed with usability in mind. It features light insulation, making it a perfect choice for high-intensity workouts.

  • Insulation crafted from recycled materials
  • Abrasion resistant
  • Nose wipe
  • Knit storm cuff
name: Auclair Stormi Mitts - Women's
